Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Carla's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that when she and Delly were younger, Sherry and Tina would often babysit them.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Carla and Delly are found covered in glass, melted from the burned out greenhouse in the forest they died in. Unbeknownst to Tina, she and Delly had reanimated into zombies and were able to attack her, breaking the glass layer on top of them, when she got too close, resulting in her death. One moment later she is put down by Daryl.
Death[]: Killed By Dwight (Alive, Accidental) Carla and Delly were killed as a result of the forest fire set by Dwight in the early stages of the outbreak. Daryl Dixon (Zombified) After biting Tina, Daryl puts down a zombified Carla.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Carla has killed: Tina (Infected, Alive) Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Carla and Delly are the first named characters killed by Dwight , albeit accidentally.
